## Data interface

Helper interface that adds utility functions to work more conveniently with bytes in normal user scenarios.

Concretely: text(), hex(), json()

**Signature:**

```typescript
export interface Data extends Uint8Array 
```
**Extends:** Uint8Array

## Methods

<table><thead><tr><th>

Method


</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>
<tbody><tr><td>

[hex()](./bee-js-docs-project.data.hex.md)


</td><td>

Converts the binary data into hex-string.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[json()](./bee-js-docs-project.data.json.md)


</td><td>

Converts the binary data into string which is then parsed into JSON.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[text()](./bee-js-docs-project.data.text.md)


</td><td>

Converts the binary data using UTF-8 decoding into string.


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>
